EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App.Email - Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
We would like to invite you to our newest webinar, Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App! In the webinar, guest Forrester Research Analyst Michael Facemire and Tricentis VP of Product Management, Gerd Weishaar, will discuss how to ensure the quality of modern mobile apps and contain the end-to-end explosion of back-end data sources that ultimately deliver the ideal mobile app experience.
Our “Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App” webinar will take place on June 9th, 2015, starting at 4:00 pm CET. We look forward to seeing you at our webinar! Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<#>
<#> Tue, Jun 9, 2015 4:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. CET 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. EDT
Michael Facemire Need Title Forrester
Gerd Weishaar VP Product Management Tricentis
